summary: Page 88 (left side), chapter 5. Sections 140-145. All 6 sections captured correctly with good accuracy. Minor text issues in a few places.

issues.description: OCR has 'אבל במצות שעשה אביו וחיו כבר מת' - the phrase 'וחיו כבר מת' is awkward. The image appears to read 'דהוא כבר מת' or 'וכיון דכבר מת' (since he already died), which makes better sense contextually.
OCR has 'ראוי שפיר לקייס' - the word 'לקייס' is a likely OCR error for 'לקיים' (to fulfill).
OCR has 'וסדר היום' with a leading vav. The image shows the source name is 'סדר היום' without the conjunction vav.
